name: Sable
long_description: Sable is a digital banking platform and the only full-suite banking solution for internationals in the U.S., providing U.S. bank accounts, debit and credit cards. Newcomers to the U.S. can open a Sable account within five minutes, and start building their U.S. credit history from day 1, all without the need of an SSN or prior U.S. credit history. The Sable app is available on iOS and Android.
one_liner: Mobile bank for credit-worthy, new-to-America internationals offeringâ€¦
